entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
